headline: Ralph Lauren (RL) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of fashion brand Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) jumped 3% in the afternoon session after Guggenheim initiated coverage on the luxury apparel company with a "Neutral" rating, an event that coincided with broader positive sentiment from other analysts. Despite the neutral stance from one firm, recent research from other analysts tilted "decisively positive." This positive outlook was supported by a series of upward price target revisions reflecting confidence in the brand's momentum. The company ha
